sub_title: International Trade | Commodities | Petrochemicals | Logistics | Brazil
summary:
Sales Executive working in the consumers goods industry. Frontline approach to new clients (B2B) to achieve revenue, sales targets and development of new business.

Fluent in English, advanced level of Portuguese and Dutch as native language, with a bachelor degree in Trade Management from the Rotterdam Business School, The Netherlands. 

International work experience in The Netherlands, France, China and Brazil.

Specialties/abilities:
Sales Management, New Business Development, International Sales, B2B, Outbound Sales. International Trade, Pricing, Maritime Logistics, Project Cargo.

school.name: Shanghai University of International Business and Economics

profile_positions.location: Zwijndrecht, Holanda do Sul, Países Baixos
profile_positions.description:
- Responsible for sales to existing customers in Southern Brazil and expanding the client portfolio by proactively reaching out to prospects
- Analyzing the market to find opportunities in order to broaden the different types of products sold in Southern Brazil
- Negotiating prices with clients and internally with product managers
- Regular contact with logistics department to stay up to date on ongoing logistical changes and to make sure shipments go as planned
- Visiting clients and prospects on quarterly basis
- Attending oversees trade shows and events
- Managing local agent to improve performance
profile_positions.title: Sales Manager Brazil

profile_positions.location: Zwijndrecht, Holanda do Sul, Países Baixos
profile_positions.title: Customer Service & Logistics (Induction program for Sales Manager)
Sales Executive New Partnerships

profile_positions.description:
- Outbound sales and development (Hunter) of new business (B2B) to expand market share within the United States
- Analysis of dealers' growth potential 
- Negotiation of international agreements (contracts, terms and fees)
- Preparation and follow up of proposals and quotations  
- Demonstration of products throughout trade shows across the USA 
- Development of new business throughout visitation of potential clients within the United States
- Regular presentation of reports to management regarding sales development and targets achievement
- Tool of Work: CRM Salesforce
profile_positions.title: International Sales Executive

profile_positions.description:
- Day to day contact with Head Office in Marseille, France on sales aspects of trades 
- Monitoring vessel performance on volume and weight and enact head office allocation and 
performance requirements 
- Check with clients about the interest in our offered quotations
- Informing other departments within CMA CGM about changing surcharges, routes or new rules/laws set by the importing countries
- Receiving requests from clients for dry container, reefer and OOG exports from Western Europe and Mediterranean Sea to ports in Africa, Indian Ocean and Oceania. From November 2015 exports from Western Europe and Mediterranean to South America and the Caribbean.
- Offering standard rates from the system or special rates that were negotiated with the head office by me to the clients.
- Daily contact with the area managers of several lines that were responsible for establishing the
ocean freight rates.
- Monitoring the bookings per vessel on a weekly basis
- Contact with transshipment ports and head office regarding priority containers and delayed 
Containers 
- Monitoring: Informing clients that their consignee has not picked up their container(s) which will result in 
Penalties
- Visiting clients
profile_positions.title: Assistant Line Manager

profile_positions.description:
JUMP (Junior Upwards Mobility Program) - Invitation for working at the Head Office for a period of six months

- Responsible for establashing general ocean freight rates for all the world wide agencies for the export  from Guiana, Suriname and French Guiana to any port. Sometimes also establishing rates for export from Caribbean ports.
- Making special offers for clients that would ship bigger volumes on a regular basis.
- Gathering market information through the agents by phone and e-mail.
- Reporting to the Line Manager and VP of the line on a weekly basis

- Quoting for break bulk/special cargo from Europe to the Caribbean and east coast of South America
- Calculating rates for special cargo and offering them to the CMA CGM agents based in Europe.
- Gathering information on the feasibility of loading/discharging the special cargo with ports of load, ports of discharge and transshipment ports and the local CMA CGM agents.
- Requesting rates from the different ports for loading/discharging and lashing/securing in order to offer the financially most interesting and best/fastest service for the client
- Discussing possibilities for shipping special cargo with the operations deparment in the HO
- Conducting competition research and creating a power point presentation about the performance over the years for the Line Manager and VP of the line
profile_positions.title: Area Manager

profile_positions.location: Capelle aan den IJssel / India / Brazil / Mexico
profile_positions.description: Digitizing and checking the quality of HR files of Philips at several branches located in India, Brazil and Mexico

profile_positions.description:
- Monitoring the import containers of solar panels from China
- Contact with Chinese clients regarding the delivery schedule of containers to different 
  project sites.
- Arranging transports from port/warehouse to receiver with transport companies
- Organizing documents for customs department and import department
- Contact with shipping companies regarding new lots of import containers
